statements.select:
SELECT T.BIN_PLC_NO, WPD.MATERIAL_NO, WPD.MATER_NAME, WPD.MATER_MKIND, WPD.MATER_TYPE, WPD.MATER_SPEC, WPD.PRODUCTION_DATE, WPD.PALLET_NO1, WPD.PALLET_NO2, WB.CREATION_DATE FROM PSB_BIN_STATUS T INNER JOIN WBS_BIN WB ON WB.BIN_NO = T.BIN_NO JOIN WBS_PACKAGE_DATA WPD ON WPD.PACKAGE_GUID = WB.PACKAGE_GUID
WPD.MATERIAL_NO like '%'||#where.MATERIAL_NO#||'%'
T.BIN_PLC_NO like '%'||#where.BIN_PLC_NO#||'%'
WPD.PALLET_NO1 like '%'||#where.PALLET_NO1#||'%'
WPD.PALLET_NO1 like '%'||#where.PALLET_NO1#||'%'
WB.CREATION_DATE >=#where.BTIME#
WB.CREATION_DATE <= 1+#where.ETIME#
ORDER BY T.BIN_PLC_NO
